Quality Education.reason: This course aims to introduce to our students the essentials regarding the analysis and design of information systems.
evidence: This course aims to introduce to our students the essentials regarding the analysis and design of information systems.
After finishing this course, our students will be knowledgeable of analytical, problem-solving, and teamwork skills in information systems analysis and design.
the foundations of planning, analyzing, designing and maintaining information systems.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Explicitly states the role of information systems in delivering digital solutions for business operations
evidence: Currently, almost every organization is required or urged to apply information systems to deliver digital and suitable solutions for supporting business operations, enabling business sustainability or creating closer business relationships with customers, suppliers or even the entire societal members.
